hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:When a slave fulfils obligation of Allah and obligation of his master, he has two rewards for him. I narrated this to Ka'b, and Ka'b said: (Such a slave) has no accountability, nor has a poor believer

chapter.ara-name: باب ثَوَابِ الْعَبْدِ وَأَجْرِهِ إِذَا نَصَحَ لِسَيِّدِهِ وَأَحْسَنَ عِبَادَةَ اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: The reward of a slave who is sincere towards his master and worships Allah properly
